Path to the kjhslides package

kjh_resource_file.Rd

Path to the kjhslides package

Usage

kjh_resource_file(file, subdir = NULL, libpath = "slides")

Arguments

file

The file you want

libpath

The path to slides support files

subpath

Desired subfolder if any

Value

A file path
